page.title: 08CARLISLE PARK HAMPTON
page.content: Carlisle Park has a lot to offer; play area for children,tennis courts, putting green, bowling green, cricket pitch, play-group and large grassed areas. The children's area has slides, swings,roudabout and climbing frame. Carlisle Park has 6 tennis courts. Behind the bowling green is a club house. The play-group is in the pavilion and has good facilities. There is a good range of trees in the park; oak, beech, ash, cedar and pine. The gardens are well maintained by the park-keeper and various flowers are planted when in season. The park is very popular with local joggers as it's track around the grass is three quarters of a mile long. All in all it is a very good park for sports and recreation alike.
